alert.note: Alert for City of Norton; Lee; Scott; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 26 at 1:43AM EDT until June 26 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 388 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE ANDERSON CAMPBELL CLAIBORNE GRAINGER HAMBLEN HANCOCK HAWKINS KNOX MORGAN ROANE SCOTT UNION IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA CITY OF NORTON LEE SCOTT WISE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALPHA, APPALACHIA, ARTHUR, BEAN STATION, BEARDEN, BIG SOUTH FORK NATIONAL, BIG STONE GAP, BRADBURY, CARYVILLE, CLAIRFIELD, CLINTON, COEBURN, EAGLE FURNACE, ELGIN, ELK VALLEY, EVANSTON, FAIRVIEW, FINCASTLE, HARRIMAN, HARROGATE-SHAWANEE, HIGH POINT, HILTONS, HOWARD QUARTER, HUNTSVILLE, JELLICO, KINGSTON, KNOXVILLE, KYLES FORD, LA FOLLETTE, LAKE FOREST, LONE MOUNTAIN, LUTTRELL, MAYNARDVILLE, MOORESBURG, MORRISTOWN, NORMA, NORRIS LAKE, NORTON, OAK RIDGE, OLIVER SPRINGS, ONEIDA, PARDEE, PAULETTE, PETROS, PINE ORCHARD, ROCKWOOD, ROSE HILL, ROSE HILL, ROYAL BLUE, RUSSELLVILLE, SANDLICK, SHARPS CHAPEL, SLICK ROCK, SMOKEY JUNCTION, SNEEDVILLE, SPRINGDALE, TREADWAY, WHITE OAK, AND WISE.
